org.openhab.binding.lcn

Class LCNRequestList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<LCNInputModule>
          • org.openhab.binding.lcn.LCNRequestList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<LCNInputModule>, java.util.Collection<LCNInputModule>, java.util.List<LCNInputModule>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class LCNRequestList
extends java.util.ArrayList<LCNInputModule>
    Represents a list of LCNInputModules that require repeated status requests in order to be maintained.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean locked
      Represents whether the list has an active request or not.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.Object o,
               int homeSegment)
        Since this list contains LCNInputModules, comparison has to use the correct methods of said class. Classes could be different instances but still refer to the same module.
        Parameters:
        o - The object which is to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if a reasonably similar object is contained, otherwise false.
